name: KPLC7News
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from KPLC 7 News Lake Charles, Louisiana within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Lake Charles, Louisiana area from the KPLC 7 Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
